Name: DANMAKAI: Red Forbidden Fruit
About the game: The MAKAI is in crisis... Eldied and Diana, two demon girls, leave on a quest to defeat the main evil. Get past the Danmaku and try to clear it! Aggressive play is the closest you'll get to capturing it, and this is a Danmaku shooter with a Rank System. Defeating enemy, Graze a bullet, Shooting enemy... All of these active actions lead to Power Up. You can use the power you've saved to maintain a strong shot and attack it, You can also use a buster attack to eliminate enemy bullets while blowing them away, Your play style depends on your ability. The beauty of the Danmaku and the pleasure of the Shooter is Here! 6+1 total 7 Stages. 2 Playable Character(and more). ４ levels of Difficulty for beginners and professionals. 11 MAKAI Girls. Challenge Mode for the Danmaku maniacs! (Let's clear!) Replay viewer. Music room. Pixel art graphics. A little cat element.
